healthcare and other industries\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-microsoft-ignite-2019/ba-p/937025#admin\" target=\"_self\">\n   New planning and administration tools to easily manage Teams and protect your data\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-microsoft-ignite-2019/ba-p/937025#power\" target=\"_self\">\n   Automate workflows, integrate custom apps and data insights within Teams using Power Platform\n  </A>\n </LI> \n</OL> \n<DIV id=\"customize\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  1. Customize your Teams conversations and experience\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Private channels\n </STRONG> enable users to create channels within existing teams that can be viewed and accessed by only select members of that team. Users can create a private channel by selecting \"Private\" under the privacy settings of the new channel. Private channels are available starting this week and you can learn more \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/MicrosoftTeams/private-channels\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Private%20Channels.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"990\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Multiwindow \n </STRONG>capability provides&nbsp;users the option&nbsp;to pop out chats, meetings, calls or documents into separate windows to help you streamline their workflow.&nbsp;Multiwindow capabilities will start rolling out early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <VIDEO autoplay=\"autoplay\" loop=\"loop\" muted=\"\" width=\"950\" height=\"475\"> \n  <SOURCE src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/videos/Teams/PopOutChatandMeeting_Nov2%20(1).mp4\n\" type=\"video/mp4\"></SOURCE>\n </VIDEO>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Teams client for Linux \n </STRONG>will support the main Teams capabilities like chats, meetings, calling as expected so people who use Linux client at work or educational institution can collaborate with others on Teams. Users will be able to install native Linux packages in .deb and .rpm formats. Teams client for Linux will start rolling out as a preview later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  New messaging \n </STRONG>\n <STRONG>\n  extensions \n </STRONG>including Polls and Surveys will be available in Teams chat and channel conversations. Click on \"…\" at the bottom of the message compose box in a chat or channel to access these extensions and solicit instant feedback on shared items or questions. These will start rolling out later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <VIDEO autoplay=\"autoplay\" loop=\"loop\" muted=\"\" width=\"950\" height=\"475\"> \n  <SOURCE src=\"https://techcommunity.azureedge.net/videos/Teams/Poll_V3.mp4\" type=\"video/mp4\"></SOURCE>\n </VIDEO>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Pinned Channels \n </STRONG>allows users to keep important channels at the top of your teams list for easy access. This capability will be available later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Pinned%20Channels.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"m365\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  2. Easily manage conversations, tasks, and files from other Microsoft 365 apps within Teams\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  New integration between Outlook and Teams \n </STRONG>makes it easy to collaborate no matter where the conversation is taking place. The user can move an email conversation from Outlook, including attachments, into a Teams chat or channel conversation by clicking on the ‘’Share to Teams’’ in Outlook.&nbsp;They can also share a conversation from Teams to an Outlook email by clicking on the more options (‘’…’’) icon in a conversation. This will start rolling out early next year. &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <VIDEO autoplay=\"autoplay\" loop=\"loop\" muted=\"\" width=\"950\" height=\"475\"> \n  <SOURCE src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/videos/Teams/Outlook%20to%20Teams%20share.mp4\" type=\"video/mp4\"></SOURCE>\n </VIDEO>\n</P> \n<DIV>\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<DIV> \n <DIV>\n  Users will also get actionable missed activity emails which make it easy to stay on top of missed conversation in Teams. The missed activity emails show the latest replies from the conversation, and allow you to respond directly from within Outlook.\n </DIV> \n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Outlook%20and%20teams%20actions.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" /> \n <DIV>\n  &nbsp;\n </DIV> \n</DIV> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Tasks in Teams \n </STRONG>gives you a new unified view of your personal and assigned tasks within Teams. It consolidates your tasks across Microsoft To Do, Teams channels, Planner and Outlook. Users have smart views including tasks assigned to you, the priority as well as start or due date. Users can choose the view that works the best for them – list, boards, charts, schedules – to get things done. It will be available to users early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <VIDEO autoplay=\"autoplay\" loop=\"loop\" muted=\"\" width=\"950\" height=\"475\"> \n  <SOURCE src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/videos/Teams/Tasks_Full.mp4\n\" type=\"video/mp4\"></SOURCE>\n </VIDEO>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n The new \n <STRONG>\n  Yammer app for Teams \n </STRONG>makes Yammer communities, conversations, and live events accessible right within Teams. IT admins and end users can also&nbsp;pin the app on the left navigation rail in Teams&nbsp;to&nbsp;have easy access to Yammer - helping everyone stay up to date with their communities and participate in organization-wide conversations. It will start rolling out early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"YammerAppInTeams.gif\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154097iF5958DEF35CFD67B/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"YammerAppInTeams.gif\" alt=\"YammerAppInTeams.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"meetings\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  <EM>\n   3. Conduct more inclusive and effective meetings\n  </EM>\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft Whiteboard \n </STRONG>is now generally available in Teams Meetings via the share tray. This gives teams an infinite digital canvas for meeting participants to ideate and collaborate whether they are in the same room or working remotely.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Whiteboard animation.gif\" style=\"width: 703px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153641iCBB5C8BDECB2BBAC/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Whiteboard animation.gif\" alt=\"Whiteboard animation.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Live Captions \n </STRONG>in Teams Meetings makes meetings more inclusive, giving participants another way to follow along with the conversation, and addressing the needs of participants with different hearing abilities or language proficiencies. It will start rolling out as Preview in US English later this year with plans to expand to other languages in the future.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Updated%20live%20captions.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n New \n <STRONG>\n  presenter and attendee controls \n </STRONG>allow meeting organizers to pre-define presenter and attendee roles for meeting participants. Designated presenters will have full control over the meeting, whereas participants in “attendee” role won’t have ability to share content, take control, mute or remove other participants, admit people waiting in the lobby, or start/stop recordings. It will be available later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n Together with \n <STRONG>\n  Citrix,\n </STRONG> we are optimizing the performance of Microsoft Teams Calling and Meetings for Citrix \n <STRONG>\n  virtual environments\n </STRONG> allowing organizations to deliver a high-fidelity Microsoft Teams experience for an on-premises or Azure hosted virtual desktop or application.&nbsp;We expect this solution will become generally available to customers within the next 30 days.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n Expanding the \n <STRONG>\n  Cloud Video Interop (CVI)\n </STRONG> partnerships to include\n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/cisco-announcement\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"> \n  <STRONG>\n   Cisco\n  </STRONG>\n </A> the newest partner to help customers use Teams meetings with Cisco Webex Room devices and SIP video conferencing devices in the meeting rooms, starting in early CY 2020.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n With support from industry vendors, \n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft has pioneered a new approach\n </STRONG> that enables Microsoft Teams Rooms devices to connect to meeting services from other vendors via browser-based technologies. Microsoft is working with \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/cisco-announcement\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  <STRONG>\n   Cisco\n  </STRONG>\n </A> and\n <STRONG>\n   Zoom\n </STRONG> to enable a \n <STRONG>\n  direct guest join capability\n </STRONG> from the respective video conferencing devices to the video meeting service using the web app. This capability will be supported on a new generation of meeting room devices with embedded web technology. We plan to add support for other vendors over the course of time. These solutions are expected to be generally available in early 2020.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"3P meeting indicator.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154599iCA356345EFAA1D38/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"3P meeting indicator.png\" alt=\"3P meeting indicator.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Collaboration bars for Microsoft Teams \n </STRONG>are a new category of devices from our partners to convert small spaces into online meeting and collaboration spaces. These affordable, simple to install and easy to manage video conferencing solutions attach to your displays, TVs or touchscreens in minutes for high-quality video meetings. It enables experiences like one-touch &amp; proximity join, content sharing and whiteboarding.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Poly\n </STRONG> with their Studio X Series and \n <STRONG>\n  Yealink\n </STRONG> with VC210 are first two partners to launch their devices in early 2020.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"MicrosoftTeams-image.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153715iB72597925015540F/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"MicrosoftTeams-image.png\" alt=\"MicrosoftTeams-image.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n New \n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft Teams speakerphones \n </STRONG>have a dedicated Teams button which gives users the ability to have a seamless interaction with Teams. The first speakerphone to be certified is available from Yealink CP900 today, which will soon be followed by additional speakerphones built for Teams from our other peripheral partners. Additionally, we are offering 20% off all phones and peripherals which are certified for Teams during Microsoft Ignite. To take advantage, just add the promo code MSIGNITE19 at checkout on office.com/teamsdevices between November 4th, 2019 to November 15th, 2019\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n New \n <STRONG>\n  enterprise Phone System capabilities\n </STRONG>, such as emergency calling, call queue functionality, administrative control, Phone System for Government customers like GCC High and DoD, as well as advanced functionalities like music on hold, call delegation and voice mail management will be available by end of this year. Additionally, we also announced new ISV partner enterprise voice advancements like Contact Center and Compliance Recording that make Teams Phone System a great cloud phone system solution for enterprise customers. You can find more information in the Teams Calling \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/callingblog\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  blog\n </A>.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"flw\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<DIV>\n Learn more about Microsoft Teams devices \n <A href=\"http://office.com/teamsdevices\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A>.\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  <EM>\n   4. Give your Firstline Workers easier access to Teams\n  </EM>\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  SMS Sign-In\n </STRONG> gives Firstline Workers a low friction way to sign into Teams with their phone number and a one-time SMS passcode for authentication. It will be available as a public preview early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"SMS Sign In - TEAMS.gif\" style=\"width: 192px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153737iDEAF28532103778B/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"SMS Sign In - TEAMS.gif\" alt=\"SMS Sign In - TEAMS.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Off shift access\n </STRONG> is a new setting that can be enabled by IT administrators to provide a notification to Firstline Workers when they access the Teams app on their personal device outside payable hours. The users then need to provide consent to the notification before being able to access their app. It will start rolling out early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Off shift demo gif (final).gif\" style=\"width: 225px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153747i7C122A679A023905/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"Off shift demo gif (final).gif\" alt=\"Off shift demo gif (final).gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Global Sign-Out\n </STRONG> saves time and keeps Firstline Workers secure when they use shared devices at work by enabling them to sign-out at once from all the apps they use on their shift. This feature will initially be available as a public preview for Android devices early next year and in preview for iOS devices thereafter.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"global sign out gif.gif\" style=\"width: 238px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153789iD23CBA58BF76D7C6/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"global sign out gif.gif\" alt=\"global sign out gif.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Delegated User Management\n </STRONG> enables Firstline managers to manage user credentials and approve password reset requests via the My Staff portal. As a result, Firstline managers are empowered to unblock staff issues, reducing the burden of identity management on IT. It will be available as a public preview early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Graph API enhancements\n </STRONG>&nbsp;provide two-way communication between a workforce management system&nbsp;of your choosing&nbsp;and Shifts to enable&nbsp;enterprise-scale configuration. And with new \n <STRONG>\n  open source integration&nbsp;templates\n </STRONG> on GitHub,&nbsp;customers can integrate Teams with Kronos and JDA. JDA connectors are available now and Kronos coming later this month.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"health\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <EM>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   5. Enable industry-specific scenarios in healthcare and other industries\n  </FONT>\n </EM>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Virtual Consults\n </STRONG> offers a simple way to schedule and conduct B2C virtual consultations via Microsoft Teams, such as&nbsp;healthcare patient consults, client meetings, or job candidate interviews. Attendees can easily join the virtual consultation via their web browser or Teams mobile app. Teams has enabled virtual consults through its new external appointments functionality and is now in private preview.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"VC pics both1.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154349iEBDA9528A1256F68/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"VC pics both1.png\" alt=\"VC pics both1.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Patient Coordination\n </STRONG>&nbsp;in Teams enables healthcare professionals to streamline patient care.&nbsp;By entering patient information into Teams’ secure platform, physicians, nurses, and other care team members can centralize and digitize the information they need when communicating and collaborating around patients in various scenarios like patient rounding, multi-disciplinary team meetings, and discharge huddles. Patient Coordination in Teams supports enterprise-grade security and enables HIPAA compliance. It will be available in public preview soon.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Patients_manual%20demo%207.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"admin\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  <EM>\n   6. New planning and administration tools to easily manage Teams and protect your data\n  </EM>\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Advisor for Teams \n </STRONG>assists IT admins in planning a successful Teams deployment for their organization, offering recommended plans and a collaboration space for the deployment team to streamline the roll out of all the Teams workloads, including messaging, meetings and calling workloads. This feature is&nbsp;currently in public preview.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"AdvisorForTeams.gif\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153827i82B67C96CFF1B33D/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"AdvisorForTeams.gif\" alt=\"AdvisorForTeams.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft \n </STRONG>\n <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/Microsoft-365-Blog/Teams-is-coming-to-Office-365-Business-amp-Office-365-ProPlus/ba-p/725481\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  <STRONG>\n   Teams in Office 365 Business &amp; Office 365 ProPlus\n  </STRONG>\n </A>\n <STRONG>\n   semi-annual channel\n </STRONG> will streamline your Teams deployment with Office ProPlus. Starting&nbsp;on&nbsp;January 14th, 2020,&nbsp;Click-to-Run&nbsp;will install the Teams client for all PCs on the semi-annual channel, and the client will&nbsp;update itself&nbsp;regularly from that point onward.&nbsp;This will be a gradual rollout over several weeks, so not all existing installations will immediately get Teams added when Office is updated.&nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<DIV>\n <SPAN>\n  New&nbsp;\n </SPAN>\n <STRONG>\n  <SPAN>\n   app&nbsp;catalog&nbsp;\n  </SPAN>\n </STRONG>helps IT admins get the information they need to confidently enable apps from the Microsoft Teams admin center. The catalog provides administrators details such as name, description, certification status, publisher, and policy details for applications available in their Teams environment. The certification status within the catalog covers a 2-tiered program – \n <U>\n  <SPAN>\n   <A tabindex=\"-1\" title=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-app-certification/teams/teams-apps\" href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-app-certification/teams/teams-apps\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">\n    Publisher self-attestation\n   </A>\n  </SPAN>\n </U> and a rigorous \n <U>\n  <SPAN>\n   <A tabindex=\"-1\" title=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-app-certification/docs/certification-submission-guide\" href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-app-certification/docs/certification-submission-guide\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">\n    Microsoft 365 Certification\n   </A>\n  </SPAN>\n </U>. These programs ensure admins have full visibility into app’s security and compliance practices. This will start rolling out by end of this year.\n</DIV> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"App Catalog.JPG\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154602iF3540A6084D8F49D/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"App Catalog.JPG\" alt=\"App Catalog.JPG\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Policy packages \n </STRONG>make it easier to assign policies and ensure your users have access to the Teams capabilities they need. IT Admins can assign a policy package, a collection of predefined policies and policy settings, to users who have similar roles in the organization. The first set of policies packages are available now and are designed for roles in the education space. We will continue to release more policy packages soon. Learn more \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/microsoftteams/manage-policy-packages?branch=FLW-working\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  &nbsp;\n </STRONG>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Policy\n </STRONG>\n <STRONG>\n   assignment to security groups in PowerShell\n </STRONG> is also going to be available by end of this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft Teams Rooms \n </STRONG>\n <STRONG>\n  in the Teams Admin Portal\n </STRONG> will allow the IT admins to manage the device inventory for your organization and do tasks such as assign configurations, restart devices, monitor and diagnose. This will start rolling out later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"MTR Management crop.gif\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154541iB8914691E919EE99/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"MTR Management crop.gif\" alt=\"MTR Management crop.gif\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Managed Meeting Rooms\n </STRONG> is a new Microsoft offer for managing meeting rooms as a service. &nbsp;This cloud-based IT management and security monitoring service ensures that Teams meeting rooms are secured, up to date, and proactively monitored for a great in-room experience. To date, we've&nbsp;been working with more than 100 customers to manage more than 1,500 meeting rooms. The private preview will open this experience to more of you! If you’re interested in participating in the private preview, you can \n <A href=\"https://preview.rooms.microsoft.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  register your interest here\n </A>\n <U>\n  .\n </U>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Safe Links in Microsoft Teams, \n </STRONG>powered by Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection, now safeguards Teams messages from harmful links in real time. When a web address (URL) is shared in a private chat or channel conversation, Teams will perform a time-of-click verification of web addresses and alert users of any risk such as malware or viruses.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/SafeLinks.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n Other security and compliance capabilities that will be available by end of this year include support for messaging events such as deletion and edit within \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/audit-log-events\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  audit log search\n </A>\n <SPAN>\n  ; \n </SPAN>the extension of \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/information-barriers-in-teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  information barriers policies\n </A> to apply to files stored in a team’s SharePoint site; support for retention policies as short as one day within Teams \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/retention-policies\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  retention policies\n </A>\n <SPAN>\n  ;\n </SPAN> and the expansion of \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/ediscovery-investigation\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  e-Discovery\n </A> results to now include search results for keywords and the conversations around them.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"power\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <FONT size=\"5\">\n  <EM>\n   7. Automate workflows, integrate custom apps and data insights within Teams using Power Platform\n  </EM>\n </FONT>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Power Apps creators can now publish their apps as Teams apps\n </STRONG> for easy use and access when working on Teams. Admins can also publish these custom apps directly to their company’s app library in Teams, making them more discoverable to users. New updates also improve the experience of adding these apps to Teams. It will start rolling out later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Publishing%20as%20Teams%20app.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  P\n </STRONG>\n <STRONG>\n  inning an app created with Power Apps to Teams \n </STRONG>left rail will provide users easy access to frequently used apps in everyday use. It will be available to users later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/User%20app%20pinning_20191025.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Teams-centric actions &amp; triggers with Power Automate \n </STRONG>allows users to create new kinds of automated workflows within Teams. The user can create a trigger for specific actions when someone new joins their team, notifications within Teams when a certain keyword is mentioned, automatically set focused time and to save notes to OneNote. These will be available to users later this year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Welcome%20new%20team%20mate_20191025.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Power BI interactive cards in Teams \n </STRONG>chat experience will help users quickly find and take actions on their data. It will start rolling out early next year.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Power%20BI%20adaptive%20card_20191025.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"980\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<H3>\n <FONT size=\"4\">\n  <EM>\n   We are committed to delivering rich and engaging experiences that help our customers like \n   <A href=\"https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/760464-loreal-consumergoods-m365\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n    L’Oreal\n   </A>, \n   <A href=\"https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/765534-telstra-telecommunications-teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n    Telstra\n   </A>, \n   <A href=\"https://customers.microsoft.com/doclink/765940-special-olympics-nonprofit-teams\" target=\"_self\">\n    Special Olympics\n   </A>, \n   <A href=\"https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/760506-stlukes-teams-chapter-healthprovider-m365\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n    St. Lukes\n   </A> and \n   <A href=\"https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/764851-berkshire-healthcare-nhs-foundation-trust-health-provider-teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n    Berkshire\n   </A> to transform their work culture and business processes with Teams. \n  </EM>\n </FONT>\n</H3> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<H3>\n <FONT size=\"4\">\n  <EM>\n   Get guidance and tools to help you with the adoption of Teams at our \n  </EM>\n  <A href=\"https://aka.ms/MicrosoftAdoption\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   <EM>\n    Microsoft Adoption\n   </EM>\n  </A>\n  <EM>\n    hub. 6cf60.webp","https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153789iD23CBA58BF76D7C6/image-size/medium?v=1.0&px=400":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn48@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-57-08-801_eaa029e737420221.webp","https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154349iEBDA9528A1256F68/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn100@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-57-29-283_c8b482e9cea0d16f.webp","https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Patients_manual%20demo%207.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn3@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-57-36-389_059004ed2f8db67d.webp","https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/153827i82B67C96CFF1B33D/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn60@2020_6/2020/08/24/23-57-28-233_064b4129156d4a46.webp","https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154602iF3540A6084D8F49D/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn52@2020_5/2020/08/24/23-58-01-785_5e2a4e081c8524af.webp","https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/154541iB8914691E919EE99/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn24@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-58-25-596_197c3f4f0547cced.webp","https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/SafeLinks.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn47@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-57-19-193_ba547ee6dcbc10bf.webp","https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Publishing%20as%20Teams%20app.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn24@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-57-46-762_2ac2aa1210058c2f.webp","https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/User%20app%20pinning_20191025.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn12@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-57-37-862_88e18cad352ca876.webp","https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s 07:56:41","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 07:56:41","title":"Total Economic Impact™ Of using Microsoft  Teams as a platform and Teams with Power Platform","link":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/total-economic-impact-of-using-microsoft-teams-as-a-platform-and/ba-p/1520009","description":"<P>We commissioned Forrester Consulting to conduct&nbsp;a <A href=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Forrester%20TEI_Microsoft%20Teams%20Platform_06%2026%202020%20FINAL.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">New Technology Total Economic&nbsp;Impact™ study of Microsoft Teams Platform</A>&nbsp;and examine potential return on investment enterprises may realize by rolling out the Microsoft Teams platform. Forrester interviewed six customers and two partners across a range of industries and global geographies to determine how using Teams as a platform changed their organizations*.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Common pain points customers cited in their operations before adopting Microsoft Teams as a platform were:</P>\n<OL>\n<LI>Organization struggled to drive adoption for productivity and data visualization tools already available to employees.</LI>\n<LI>Employees constantly switched between applications and tools throughout the day, losing time and momentum.</LI>\n<LI>Employees sometimes chose publicly available third-party communication applications, increasing risks for data security for the organizations.</LI>\n</OL>\n<P>Using the Microsoft Teams platform as a hub for teamwork enabled organizations to reduce disruptions to employee productivity, helped IT and security teams strengthen protection against data leaks, and contributed to a culture of citizen developers that, in turn, accelerated business digitization and innovation. The study reflected a projected return on investment of 393% to 1,085% over 3 years and following key projected benefits.</P>\n<P><span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"3.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/205811i9C32546B92634DAE/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"3.png\" alt=\"3.png\" /></span></P>\n<P>Besides the directly quantifiable, below benefits were identified through the study.</P>\n<UL>\n<LI>Increased employee engagement - Better aligned functionality in one consolidated, easy-to-use platform reduced the efforts for employees to accomplish their daily tasks, leading to a better EX.</LI>\n<LI>Improved insights to influence decision making - The Teams platform presents real-time data in an easy-to-digest format through integration with data visualization tools, enabling organizations to act on insights and accelerate decision making.</LI>\n<LI>Better business outcomes - Certain applications integrated into the Teams platform support business functions instead of back-end operations and open previously untapped revenue streams.</LI>\n</UL>\n<P>Additional uses and business opportunities found in the study included:</P>\n<UL>\n<LI>Driving further employee adoption - Introducing new employee groups to the platform would inevitably lead to new use cases and better business outcomes.</LI>\n<LI>Nourishing citizen developers - A central collaboration environment for citizen developers across the organization will remove a bottleneck from innovation efforts.</LI>\n<LI>Expanding integrations - Integrating new tools and data sources into the Microsoft Teams platform and making them usable could have a big impact on utilizing the existing knowledge within each organization.</LI>\n</UL>\n<P>Download the June 2020 study, <A href=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Microsoft%20Teams/Forrester%20TEI_Microsoft%20Teams%20Platform_06%2026%202020%20FINAL.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">New Technology: The Projected Total Economic Impact Of The Microsoft Teams Platform</A>&nbsp;today and learn more about the measurable impact Microsoft Teams as a platform can have for your organization.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>* <EM><FONT size=\"2\">Based on the interviews, Forrester constructed a TEI framework, a composite company, and an associated ROI analysis that illustrates the areas financially affected. The composite organization is representative of the companies of the six customers that Forrester interviewed and is used to present the aggregate financial analysis. The composite organization is a global, multibillion-dollar company with a strong brand and a large customer base. Of the 30,000 employees spread across many business lines, 10% to 15% are active users of the Microsoft Teams platform. Active users rely on the platform to perform their daily tasks. The remaining employees are currently using Teams for communication purposes only.</FONT></EM></P>","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 16 Jul 2020 16:33:14 +0000","feedId":8350,"bgimg":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/205811i9C32546B92634DAE/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999","linkMd5":"370ce22c3d23e591b4150c61cab4a4b9","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn20@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-56-43-738_2bb62df244b266f6.webp","destWidth":999,"destHeight":449,"sourceBytes":205780,"destBytes":50064,"author":"MicrosoftTeamsTeam","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/205811i9C32546B92634DAE/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn20@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-56-43-738_2bb62df244b266f6.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598313401918},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 07:56:41","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 07:56:41","title":"What’s New in Microsoft Teams | May 2020","link":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015","description":"<P>\n This month, we have new meetings, calling, devices, chat, collaboration, platform, and industry features we will not want you to miss. Read on to stay up-to-date. If you are interested in our recent Microsoft Build news, check out our \n <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-build-edition-2020/ba-p/1394224\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Teams Build blog\n </A>!\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#meetings\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Meetings, Calling, and Devices\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#chat\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Chat &amp; Collaboration\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#onboard\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Onboarding your organization to Teams\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#dev\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Developer, Platform, and App management\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#edu\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Education\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/what-s-new-in-microsoft-teams-may-2020/ba-p/1423015#gov\" target=\"_self\">\n   <STRONG>\n    Government\n   </STRONG>\n  </A>\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<DIV id=\"meetings\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: Meetings, Calling, and Devices\n  </FONT>\n </STRONG> \n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Improved meeting join launcher experience\n </STRONG>\n <BR />When launching a Teams meeting from a link, you will be provided with clearer options for how to join the meeting. You will be prompted with an option to join on the web, download the Teams client, or join with the native Teams client. We are gradually rolling this out over the coming weeks, and in the interim, you may continue to see this and the former experience.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture1.png\" style=\"width: 889px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194970i0603E909D0CA62E2/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture1.png\" alt=\"Picture1.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Easily access meeting options during a Teams meeting\n </STRONG> \n <BR />We are making it easier for meeting organizers to quickly and easily change their presenter and lobby settings once a meeting has started by providing a link directly in the participants pane. This new functionality is available for both scheduled and “Meet Now” meetings.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture2.png\" style=\"width: 400px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194972i65760CB99DAACCB5/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"Picture2.png\" alt=\"Picture2.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Download a participant report in a Teams meeting\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Meeting organizers, especially teachers, often need to know who joined their Teams meetings. You can download a participant report, found in the roster view that includes join and leave times for participants. Available in the roster view, meeting organizers can download the report that includes those users who joined while the organizer was present. This feature is only available within the meeting while the meeting is active. Available on desktop (Windows and Mac) and the web.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture3.png\" style=\"width: 392px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194973i3F670DA3FFF8D883/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"Picture3.png\" alt=\"Picture3.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Set tenant-wide default selection for \"Who Can Present\" in meetings\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Tenant admins can now update their Teams meeting policies to allow for a new default selection when choosing who can present in new Teams meetings (everyone, people in my organization, specific people, or only me). Today, the default selection is “everyone” unless the meeting organizer selects otherwise through the meetings option configuration. To start, organizations can set this policy via a PowerShell cmdlet, and soon after we will have this policy configurable in the Admin portal.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Set background effects policy at a user-level\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Tenant admins can soon assign a user-level policy to control how users engage with background effects in Teams meetings. Options include: offer no filters; background blur only; use background blur and default provided images; and all, which includes the ability for users to upload their own custom images.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Better policy controls over screen sharing from chats\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Screen share from chat allows you to immediately start sharing your screen in a 1-1 chat or group chat. This entry point was previously governed by the AllowPrivateCalling policy. If this policy is disabled, users are not able to screen share from chat. The option to start a screen share from chat will now be governed by the ScreenSharingMode policy. Further, the ability to \"add audio\" to a screen share from chat session (if you want to talk to someone while screen sharing) will be governed by a user's AllowPrivateCalling setting. This ensures that users who have AllowPrivateCalling disabled cannot start audio calls via screen share from chat.\n <BR />\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture5.png\" style=\"width: 763px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194975i636E3661D7E8C212/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture5.png\" alt=\"Picture5.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Teams and Skype Interoperability\n </STRONG> \n <BR />Teams and Skype interoperability will enable collaboration with more partners, customers, and suppliers who rely upon Skype for Consumer (SFC) as their communication app. On either platform, customers will be able to discover users via email search, then chat or call using audio/video. Clients supported include Desktop, Web and Mobile (iOS/Android). Admins will be able to control user access to this feature from The Teams Admin Center.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Reverse Number Lookup (RNL) Enhancements\n </STRONG>\n <BR />In the past, the caller name sometimes did not show when they called you. Back in October 2019 we released the feature to make it easier to identify the caller. With the latest enhancements to RNL, the Telco display name will now also show up in your Activity Feed, Call History, and Voicemail as well.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft Teams Rooms, app version 4.4.41.0 now available\n </STRONG>\n <BR />While physical meeting rooms may not be a focal point for many right now, there are still organizations and industries whose essential workers continue to rely on these spaces during this time. We also recognize the vital role Microsoft Teams Rooms will play when organizations return to work. The latest update, app version 4.4.41.0, is now available on the Windows store and is coming to every Teams room over the next few weeks. New features include: Modern authentication support, New application splash screen, Ability to project content to a single display when using a HDMI cable in a dual display configuration, Support for dynamic emergency calling, and more. To learn more about these new features, read the \n <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/microsoft-teams-rooms-may-update/ba-p/1387779\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Microsoft Teams Rooms May Update blog\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Poly announces new solution for Microsoft Teams Rooms\n </STRONG> \n <BR />Poly Room Solution for Microsoft Teams not only delivers the premium Poly audio and video for Teams, but also provides a clutter-free experience from start to finish, with simple installation and maintenance in any size room. To learn more about the Poly solutions for Microsoft Teams Rooms, coming later this year, click \n <A href=\"https://www.poly.com/us/en/solutions/platform/microsoft/teams-rooms\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture6.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194977i2D41C0175804C7C8/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture6.png\" alt=\"Picture6.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Jabra PanaCast now certified for Microsoft Teams\n </STRONG> \n <BR />The Jabra PanaCast is a plug-and-play device, certified for Microsoft Teams. The Jabra PanaCast is designed to improve meetings by using three 13-megapixel cameras and real-time video stitching to give a full 180° view. Enjoy a natural, inclusive human perspective, with no blind spots ensuring quick, easy collaboration with hassle-free video and audio. To learn more about the Jabra PanaCast, click \n <A href=\"https://www.jabra.com/business/video-conferencing/jabra-panacast\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture7.1.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/194978iBCB9484F51A112C0/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture7.1.png\" alt=\"Picture7.1.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Yealink, EPOS, and Jabra announce new Teams peripherals\n </STRONG> \n <BR />With increased demand for remote work and virtual communication, having the right set of personal devices provides painless interaction and increases time for meaningful connection. With Teams certified devices, you can join professional meetings anywhere with high audio fidelity that removes distracting background noise and ensures that your voice is heard clearly.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n Here are some new releases this month:\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  EPOS ADAPT 360, 460T, 560, and 660 headsets range from in ear and over the ear options that optimize concentration and productivity any environment with Active Noise Cancellation, Bluetooth connectivity, and a dedicated Teams button. Availability varies by product: ADAPT 360 (July 3), ADAPT 460T (June 29), ADAPT 560 (June 26), ADAPT 660 (June 22). You can learn more \n  <A href=\"https://www.eposaudio.com/en/us/enterprise/technology/platforms-partners/microsoft-teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   here\n  </A>.\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture8.1.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195171i483B58FAF443B44D/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture8.1.png\" alt=\"Picture8.1.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  Yealink UH36 Dual/Mono is a simple and lightweight USB headset with a dedicated Teams button for long conference calls. Availability starting on May 15. You can learn more \n  <A href=\"https://www.yealink.com/product/headset-uh36\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   here\n  </A>.\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture9.1.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195172i03CEECB2E23B291D/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture9.1.png\" alt=\"Picture9.1.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  Jabra Speak 750 is a speaker phone with a dedicated Teams button helps users hold natural conversations with USB and Bluetooth. Availability starting on June 1. You can learn more \n  <A href=\"https://www.jabra.com/business/speakerphones/jabra-speak-series/jabra-speak-750\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   here\n  </A>.\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture10.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195173i5DB5A6BF56166FC5/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture10.png\" alt=\"Picture10.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   Limited time partner offers available for Teams Devices\n  </FONT>\n </STRONG>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Crestron\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Crestron is offering a \n <A href=\"https://www.crestron.com/Resources/Promotions/Flex-and-Teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  program\n </A> for customers looking to upgrade existing systems to those certified for Microsoft Teams. Special offers are available for a Crestron Smart Soundbar, Flex C-Series Integrator Kit and Mercury system. Offers end June 30, 2020 and are available in the U.S., Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Asia and EMEA. Purchase orders must be placed through an authorized Crestron dealer.\n <BR />\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Poly\n </STRONG>\n <BR />For customers using Trio Visual+ in Skype for Business who would like to move to a Microsoft Teams environment, Poly is offering a \n <A href=\"https://www.poly.com/us/en/promotions/trio-visual-plus-trade-in\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Trio Visual+ to Poly Studio X30 Trade In program\n </A>. With this promotion, Poly Microsoft customers can replace Trio with Poly Studio X30 and TC8 controller, or pair Trio with the Poly Studio X30, for Teams video meetings in huddle and small room spaces. Between April 15, 2020 and December 31, 2020, customers can trade in Trio Visual+ and save up to $200 when they upgrade to a Poly Studio X30 or up to $300 when they upgrade to a Poly Studio X30 with TC8 controller. This program is globally available.\n <BR />\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Yealink\n </STRONG>\n <BR />For a limited time, Yealink is offering a \n <A href=\"https://www.yealink.com/solution/remote-work-with-microsoft-teams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  devices bundle trial program for remote workers\n </A>, giving customers 50% off MSRP on any two WFH devices (limit one per device model). This offer is valid through July 31, 2020 and is globally available. Additionally, Yealink is offering a coupon code for the VC210 Teams edition collaboration bar on the \n <A href=\"https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/microsoft-teams/across-devices/devices/product?deviceid=430\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Microsoft Teams devices showcase\n </A>. Use the coupon code: \n <STRONG>\n  Yealink4Teams\n </STRONG> at checkout to access the discounted price. This offer is available in the US and Canada only and is valid through July 31, 2020.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"chat\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: Chat &amp; Collaboration\n  </FONT> \n </STRONG>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Templates in Teams\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Create a new team even faster with a variety of templates for common team types. Options will include event management, crisis response, hospital ward and bank branch, just to name a few. Templates comes with pre-defined channels, apps, and guidance on how to utilize and customize it. IT professionals can standardize team structures by creating new custom templates for their organization. Templates in Teams will roll out in the next few months and appear automatically. Check out the \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/teamtemplatesblog\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  deep dive blog\n </A> to learn more.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Teams/TemplatesInTeams.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"990\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Microsoft Lists in Teams\n </STRONG> \n <BR />Microsoft Lists helps you track information and organize work. Lists are simple, smart, and flexible, so you can track issues, assets, routines, contacts, inventory and more using customizable views and smart rules and alerts to keep everyone in sync. To learn more, visit the new \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/MSLists\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Microsoft Lists resource center\n </A> and get first looks at the \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/MSLists/demo-video\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Microsoft Lists product demo video\n </A>.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture11.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195179i8CB61B501970B42E/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture11.png\" alt=\"Create a new list directly inside Teams or bring in one that already exists in Microsoft 365.\" /><span class=\"lia-inline-image-caption\" onclick=\"event.preventDefault();\">Create a new list directly inside Teams or bring in one that already exists in Microsoft 365.</span></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture12.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195180i436E0503D4840748/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Picture12.png\" alt=\"You can create, share, and track list all from within Microsoft Teams.\" /><span class=\"lia-inline-image-caption\" onclick=\"event.preventDefault();\">You can create, share, and track list all from within Microsoft Teams.</span></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Bring more people together in group chats and teams\n </STRONG> \n <BR />Whether you need to collaborate with others to deliver a big project or work with a large group of people to complete an ad-hoc task, Microsoft Teams now allows you to bring more people together. Group chats will now be able to accommodate up to 250 users and teams can now have up to 10,000 members.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Pop out chats into separate windows\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Users can now streamline their workflow and pop out chats into separate windows. This allows people to move more easily between ongoing conversations. This is now generally available.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"onboard\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: Onboarding your organization to Teams\n  </FONT>\n </STRONG>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  New Skype for Business to Teams Upgrade Advisor\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Our newest Advisor for Teams, the Skype for Business Upgrade plan, has launched within the Microsoft Teams Admin Center. Whether you’re just getting started with Microsoft Teams, already using Teams alongside Skype for Business, or ready to upgrade, this provides everything you need for a successful transition. Designed for Skype for Business customers with online or on-premises environments, the Skype for Business Upgrade plan shares a proven success framework for implementing change and step-by-step process to enable your organization’s technical and end-user readiness. We’ll connect you with valuable upgrade resources including \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/SkypeToTeams\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  planning guidance and best practices\n </A>, \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/UpgradeSuccessKit\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  free workbooks, schedules and communication templates\n </A> and \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/UpgradeWorkshops\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  live 1:many planning workshops\n </A>. Learn more \n <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/use-advisor-teams-roll-out\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  here\n </A> about using Advisor for Teams to help you roll out Teams and upgrade from Skype for Business.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"picture201.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195229i4A4E953261F53910/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"picture201.png\" alt=\"picture201.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"dev\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: Developer, Platform, and App management\n  </FONT>\n </STRONG> \n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code Extension for Teams\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Developers can use the&nbsp;new Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code Teams extension to quickly build project scaffolding, configure features, create app package manifest and setup hosting, validate app package manifest, and start the app publishing process (for yourself, to your organization’s catalog, or to the Teams app store). Visual Studio Code extension is available in \n <A href=\"https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=TeamsDevApp.ms-teams-vscode-extension\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  public preview\n </A> today. Visual Studio extension coming soon!\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"VSC (2).jpg\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195182i1E08F151E20686ED/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"VSC (2).jpg\" alt=\"VSC (2).jpg\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Bringing low-code bots to Teams, with Power Virtual Agents\n </STRONG>\n <BR />We are working with the newest component of the \n <A href=\"https://aka.ms/Teams-PowerPlatform_Build2020\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  Power Platform\n </A> – Power Virtual Agents, which is a low-code chatbot platform. New features will make it easier to create and manage low-code chatbots from within Teams and more streamlined for end users to use Power Virtual Agents bots in Teams. These new features are:\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  <STRONG>\n   Bot Template:\n  </STRONG> \n  <A href=\"https://aka.ms/PVA_BotTemplates\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   FAQ bot template\n  </A> available in GitHub\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  <STRONG>\n   Single sign-on:\n  </STRONG> Power Virtual Agents bots will be available, removing the need for users to sign in again when using a Power Virtual Agents bot in Teams\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<P>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Simplified Power Apps and Power Virtual Agents “Add to Teams”\n </STRONG> \n <BR />Coming soon, Power Apps makers will be able to click a single “Add to Teams” button in Power Apps, which will push the app to the Teams app store. Similarly, the process of adding low-code bots from Power Virtual Agents will be simplified, so developers can spend more time building and less time deploying.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Teams/PowerAppsOneClickAddtoTeams.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"990\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Enhanced workflow automation with Power Automate + Teams\n </STRONG>\n <BR />There are several new Power Automate triggers and actions built specifically for Teams to unlock custom message extensions, allow for automated @mentioning, and provide a customized bot experience. To make the process of building automation even easier, we are also rolling out new business process scenario templates built for Teams. When users create a new flow, they will see these templates when they select the “Create from Template option.”\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Power Automate triggers-actions.png\" style=\"width: 400px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195185i2AEBA8D74FF3548F/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"Power Automate triggers-actions.png\" alt=\"Power Automate triggers-actions.png\" /></span>\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Improved Power BI sharing to Teams\n </STRONG>\n <BR />We have made it even easier to share Power BI reports to Teams – simply select the report to share and click the new “Share to Teams” button in Power BI. You’ll be prompted to select the user or channel to send the report to, which will automatically be posted to the conversation.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Teams/PowerBIsharetoTeams2.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"990\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n Users can now also copy individual charts in a Power BI report, and when they are pasted to a Teams conversation, the chat will include a rich thumbnail preview of the chart, as well as an adaptive card allowing users to take actions on that chart.\n</P> \n<P>\n <IMG src=\"https://8gportalvhdsf9v440s15hrt.blob.core.windows.net/lithium/Teams/PowerBIShareChartElement.gif\" border=\"0\" width=\"990\" />\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n If you want to read more about all our new developer capabilities, check out our Teams Developer blog post: \n <A href=\"https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/blogs/whats-new-in-the-microsoft-teams-platform-microsoft-build-2020/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n  What's New in the Microsoft Teams Platform | Build 2020\n </A>.\n</P> \n<DIV id=\"edu\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: Education\n  </FONT> \n </STRONG>\n <BR />\n <STRONG>\n  Change in meeting join experience for our education customers\n </STRONG>\n <BR />Today, we allow anyone within an organization to start a Teams meeting, regardless if they are the meeting organizer or not. Moving forward, we will restrict the ability to start a meeting to only those users who have been assigned a policy to create a meeting within their organization. Meeting attendees without the ability to create a meeting will see a pre-join screen indicating that the meeting hasn't started. These individuals will be automatically admitted into the meeting once a user with permissions joins and starts the meeting. For example, where teachers are assigned a policy that enables them to create meetings, but students are not: if a student clicks on a Teams meeting not yet started by a teacher, they will be admitted into the meeting once a teacher has started a meeting.\n</P> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  Keeping distance learning engaging and secure\n </STRONG>\n <BR />With many school and universities closed for the foreseeable future, Teams supports faculty, educators, and students to connect, engage, and learn. Here is the latest guidance on how to maximize learning at a distance and keep students safe:\n</P> \n<UL> \n <LI>\n  Manage student, faculty, and staff engagement in meetings, live events, chat, and more. Learn more about these settings and how to manage them \n  <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/policy-packages-edu\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   here\n  </A>.\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  Get started in Teams with \n  <A href=\"https://support.office.com/en-us/article/downloadable-guides-6bd3eb82-0a0f-43cc-a4d2-c9f4e7ebdf39?ui=en-US&amp;rs=en-US&amp;ad=US&amp;storagetype=live#ID0EDBAAA=Students\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   student\n  </A> and \n  <A href=\"https://support.office.com/en-us/article/downloadable-guides-6bd3eb82-0a0f-43cc-a4d2-c9f4e7ebdf39?ui=en-US&amp;rs=en-US&amp;ad=US&amp;storagetype=live#ID0EDBAAA=Educators\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   educator quick start guides\n  </A> and create, run, and attend safe Teams meetings with this&nbsp;\n  <A href=\"https://support.office.com/en-us/article/creating-attending-and-running-meetings-while-using-teams-for-distance-learning-788d730f-2c7e-4761-a059-c9b3fe87adf7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   guidance\n  </A>.\n </LI> \n <LI>\n  Customize your school’s distance learning toolkit with these \n  <A href=\"https://support.office.com/en-us/article/your-lms-and-teams-better-together-for-distance-learning-35e3c70f-11b7-447d-a4d4-3964b27911ae\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\n   LMS integrations\n  </A> in Teams.\n </LI> \n</UL> \n<DIV id=\"gov\">\n &nbsp;\n</DIV> \n<P>\n &nbsp;\n</P> \n<P>\n <STRONG>\n  <FONT size=\"5\">\n   What’s New: US Government\n  </FONT>\n </STRONG> \n <BR />In-line message translation in GCC and GCC High\n <BR />In-line message translation will ensure that every worker in the team has a voice and facilitate global collaboration. With a simple click, people who speak different languages can fluidly communicate with one another by translating posts in channels and chat. This is now generally available.\n</P> \n<P>\n <span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Picture14.png\" style=\"width: 400px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/195186i6399EE766DD5B111/image-size/medium?v=1.0&amp;px=400\" title=\"Picture14.png\" alt=\"Picture14.png\" /></span>\n</P> 07:56:41","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 07:56:41","title":"Introducing the new Microsoft Teams Rooms Premium","link":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/introducing-the-new-microsoft-teams-rooms-premium/ba-p/1527686","description":"<P>The workplace is rapidly evolving, and as we’re emerging from the time of “remote everything,” it’s clear that the ways we stay in touch and collaborate are also changing. The workplace of the future will accommodate hybrid scenarios in which some people may work from the office while others may work remotely, or some fluid combination of the two. Organizations will need meeting rooms that serve as hubs for hybrid work.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Effective meeting room experiences enable users to start or join a meeting quickly for maximum productivity. Proactive management, real-time monitoring, and remediation keep rooms functional, up-to-date, and secure.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Today, we’re excited to launch <STRONG>Microsoft Teams Rooms Premium</STRONG>. This offering builds on the Microsoft Teams Rooms Standard experience and management capabilities available from the <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-teams-blog/one-place-to-manage-all-your-teams-devices/ba-p/1527766\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Teams Admin Center</A> by combining intelligent software, dedicated experts, and enhanced insights from across organizations to continuously improve the meeting room experience.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>With Microsoft Teams Rooms Premium, we provide 24/7 management and monitoring of your room operating system and software, surfacing insights and alerts around any action needed on-site and taking remote action on your behalf as permitted. <SPAN>Today’s offering is just the beginning, and we look forward to&nbsp;expanding&nbsp;with&nbsp;additional&nbsp;premium experiences in the future.&nbsp;</SPAN></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Using Microsoft Teams Rooms Premium and leveraging our partner ecosystem, we can address all your meeting room operational needs including: 1) great device setup, 2) ongoing management and monitoring, and 3) on-site support.</P>\n<P><span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Peace of Mind 3.png\" style=\"width: 997px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/206739i12AF5C1F2C702FAF/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Peace of Mind 3.png\" alt=\"Peace of Mind 3.png\" /></span></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Let’s take a closer look at the core components of the offering:</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>24/7 Intelligent operations</STRONG><BR />Around-the-clock software and machine learning to automate updates, detect and manage incidents, and scale rooms efficiently.</P>\n<UL>\n<LI><STRONG>Real-time monitoring</STRONG> to quickly detect and troubleshoot issues</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Automated update management</STRONG> saves you time and resources</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Real-time alerts</STRONG> to notify you where and how to act</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Proactive remediation</STRONG> resolves certain incidents on your behalf</LI>\n</UL>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Dedicated experts</STRONG> <BR />A team of experts provide 24x7 service operations, tiered support, and incident resolution assistance.</P>\n<UL>\n<LI><STRONG>Incident diagnosis with prescriptive guidance</STRONG> on cause and actions required</LI>\n<LI>Automated and support engineer <STRONG>assistance on troubleshooting</STRONG></LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Single point escalation</STRONG> support for all hardware vendors</LI>\n<LI>Integration with <STRONG>ServiceNow</STRONG></LI>\n</UL>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Enhanced insights</STRONG><BR />Benefit from rich analytics, reporting, and proven learnings at scale across many customers.</P>\n<UL>\n<LI><STRONG>Proven learnings</STRONG> at scale that continually improve the operational experience</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Reports and dashboards</STRONG> on daily operations and room performance including inventory, room health, and room reliability</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Insights and recommendations</STRONG> on room usage and incident trend history</LI>\n<LI><STRONG>Full transparency</STRONG> on all operations taken on your behalf, and alerts that need your attention using the dedicated admin portal</LI>\n</UL>\n<P>Our partner ecosystem plays a key role in helping us bring these end-to-end meeting room experiences to life. The rapid adoption of Microsoft Teams and increased demand in meeting rooms represent a significant opportunity for partners to grow their businesses with meeting room offerings and to assist customers by providing additional services, capabilities, and on-site support. target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Datavision</A>, <A
